metric.name: Grantors
metric.description: The current number of lock grantors hosted by this system member.

metric.name: Services
metric.description: The current number of lock services used by this system member.

metric.name: Tokens
metric.description: The current number of lock tokens used by this system mem­ber.

metric.name: Request Queues
metric.description: The current number of lock request queues used by this sys­tem member.

metric.name: Serial Queue Size
metric.description: The number of serial distribution messages currently waiting to be processed.

metric.name: Serial Threads
metric.description: The number of threads currently processing serial/ordered messages.

metric.name: Waiting Queue Size
metric.description: The number of distribution messages currently waiting for some other resource before they can be processed.

metric.name: Waiting Threads
metric.description: The number of threads currently processing messages that had to wait for a resource.

metric.name: Lock Waits In Progress
metric.description: Current number of threads waiting for a distributed lock.

metric.name: Lock Waits Completed
metric.description: Total number of times distributed lock wait has completed by successfully obtaining the lock.

metric.name: Lock Wait Time
metric.description: Total time spent waiting for a distributed lock that was obtained.

metric.name: Lock Waits Failed
metric.description: Total time spent waiting for a distributed lock that failed to be obtained.

metric.name: Lock Wait Failed Time
metric.description: Total number of times distributed lock wait has completed by failing to obtain the lock.

metric.name: Grant Waits In Progress
metric.description: Current number of distributed lock requests being granted.

metric.name: Grant Waits Completed
metric.description: Total number of times granting of a lock request has com­pleted by successfully granting the lock.

metric.name: Grant Wait Time
metric.description: Total time spent attempting to grant a distributed lock.

metric.name: Grant Waits Not Grantor
metric.description: Total number of times granting of lock request failed because not grantor.

metric.name: Grant Wait Not Grantor Time
metric.description: Total time spent granting of lock requests that failed because not grantor.

metric.name: Grant Waits Timeout
metric.description: Total number of times granting of lock request failed because of a timeout.

metric.name: Grant Wait Timeout Time
metric.description: Total time spent granting of lock requests that failed because of a timeout.

metric.name: Grant Waits Not Holder
metric.description: Total number of times granting of lock request failed because reentrant was not holder.

metric.name: Grant Wait Not Holder Time
metric.description: Total time spent granting of lock requests that failed because reentrant was not holder.

metric.name: Grant Waits Failed
metric.description: Total number of times granting of lock request failed because try locks failed.

metric.name: Grant Wait Failed Time
metric.description: Total time spent granting of lock requests that failed because try locks failed.

metric.name: Grant Waits Suspended
metric.description: Total number of times granting of lock request failed because lock service was suspended.

metric.name: Grant Wait Suspended Time
metric.description: Total time spent granting of lock requests that failed because lock service was suspended.

metric.name: Grant Waits Destroyed
metric.description: Total number of times granting of lock request failed because lock service was destroyed.

metric.name: Grant Wait Destroyed Time
metric.description: Total time spent granting of lock requests that failed because lock service was destroyed.

metric.name: Create Grantors In Progress
metric.description: Current number of initial grantors being created in this pro­cess.

metric.name: Create Grantors Completed
metric.description: Total number of initial grantors created in this process.

metric.name: Create Grantor Time
metric.description: Total time spent waiting create the initial grantor for lock ser­vices.

metric.name: Service Creates In Progress
metric.description: Current number of lock services being created in this process.

metric.name: Service Creates Completed
metric.description: Total number of lock services created in this process.

metric.name: Service Create Latch Time
metric.description: Total time spent creating lock services before releasing create latches.

metric.name: Service Init Latch Time
metric.description: Total time spent creating lock services before releasing init latches.

metric.name: Grantor Waits In Progress
metric.description: Current number of threads waiting for grantor latch to open.

metric.name: Grantor Waits Completed
metric.description: Total number of times waiting threads completed waiting for the grantor latch to open.

metric.name: Grantor Wait Time
metric.description: Total time spent waiting for the grantor latch which resulted in success.

metric.name: Grantor Waits Failed
metric.description: Total number of times waiting threads failed to finish waiting for the grantor latch to open.

metric.name: Grantor Wait Failed Time
metric.description: Total time spent waiting for the grantor latch which resulted in failure.

metric.name: Grantor Threads In Progress
metric.description: Current iterations of work performed by grantor thread.

metric.name: Grantor Threads Completed
metric.description: Total number of iterations of work performed by grantor thread(s).

metric.name: Grantor Thread Expire And Grant Locks Time
metric.description: Total time spent by grantor thread(s) performing expireAndGrantLocks tasks.

metric.name: Grantor Thread Handle Request Timeouts Time
metric.description: Total time spent by grantor thread(s) performing handleRequestTimeouts tasks.

metric.name: Grantor Thread Remove Unused Tokens Time
metric.description: Total time spent by grantor thread(s) performing removeUnusedTokens tasks.

metric.name: Grantor Thread Time
metric.description: Total time spent by grantor thread(s) performing all grantor tasks.

metric.name: Pending Requests
metric.description: The current number of pending lock requests queued by grantors in this process.

metric.name: Destroy Read Waits In Progress
metric.description: Current number of threads waiting for a DLockService destroy read lock.

metric.name: Destroy Read Waits Completed
metric.description: Total number of times a DLockService destroy read lock wait has completed successfully.

metric.name: Destroy Read Wait Time
metric.description: Total time spent waiting for a DLockService destroy read lock that was obtained.

metric.name: Destroy Read Waits Failed
metric.description: Total number of times a DLockService destroy read lock wait has completed unsuccessfully.

metric.name: Destroy Read Wait Failed Time
metric.description: Total time spent waiting for a DLockService destroy read lock that was not obtained.

metric.name: Destroy Write Waits In Progress
metric.description: Current number of writes waiting for a DLockService destroy write lock.

metric.name: Destroy Write Waits Completed
metric.description: Total number of times a DLockService destroy write lock wait has completed successfully.

metric.name: Destroy Write Wait Time
metric.description: Total time spent waiting for a DLockService destroy write lock that was obtained.

metric.name: Destroy Write Waits Failed
metric.description: Total number of times a DLockService destroy write lock wait has completed unsuccessfully.

metric.name: Destroy Write Wait Failed Time
metric.description: Total time spent waiting for a DLockService destroy write lock that was not obtained.

metric.name: Destroy Reads
metric.description: The current number of DLockService destroy read locks held by this process.

metric.name: Destroy Writes
metric.description: The current number of DLockService destroy write locks held by this process.

metric.name: Lock Releases In Progress
metric.description: Current number of threads releasing a distributed lock.

metric.name: Lock Releases Completed
metric.description: Total number of times distributed lock release has completed.

metric.name: Lock Release Time
metric.description: Total time spent releasing a distributed lock.

metric.name: Become Grantor Requests
metric.description: Total number of times this member has explicitly requested to become lock grantor.
